meanings.definition: A group of atoms that exhibit unique properties due to their arrangement.
meanings.sent1: Scientists are studying superatoms to understand their special characteristics.
meanings.sent2: The superatoms in this material have fascinating properties.
meanings.sent3: At the atomic party, the superatoms showed off their unique dance moves.
meanings.sent4: The superatoms in the alloy are like a team of superheroes, each with its own power.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the superatoms shimmered like tiny stars in the night sky.

meanings.definition: A cluster of atoms that behave as a single entity in chemical reactions.
meanings.sent1: The superatoms reacted together as if they were one atom.
meanings.sent2: Chemists are exploring the behavior of superatoms in different reactions.
meanings.sent3: In the lab, the superatoms played a game of chemical charades.
meanings.sent4: The superatoms in the solution danced harmoniously, creating a beautiful reaction.
meanings.sent5: When combined, the superatoms formed a powerful chemical bond.
